title: Python daemon and client path
description: Implement connect-or-spawn client behavior and resident daemon in Python with in-memory query indexes and write-through updates.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.text: Starting: plan Python client connect-or-spawn and daemon skeleton based on daemon lifecycle spec and IPC protocol doc.

comments.text: Implemented Python daemon scaffolding: protocol models, daemon server/client, socket/cache path helpers, and list command using daemon by default with local fallback when TASKULUS_NO_DAEMON=1. Added IPC index.list action and daemon entry point.

custom.beads_acceptance_criteria: Python CLI auto-starts daemon when needed, reuses socket when healthy, and serves indexed query paths.
